title: Global Digital Marketing Intern
content:
Global Digital Marketing InternNYC / Montreal / Pittsburgh (Hybrid)
A “Magic Quadrant” leader, Ivalua’s solutions work in a complex global economy.  Our innovative Source-to-Pay solutions include automating customized workflows to source, contract, request, procure, receive, and pay for goods and services across the enterprise, refining the procurement lifecycle while reducing cost and risk of spending on indirect goods, direct goods, and services, and improving supplier collaboration.
All companies want the best and brightest. At Ivalua, we also want team members who have a global point of view and who bring customer-focused enthusiasm and ambition to the table. We are a company of doers, of problem solvers, of figure-it-outers. We have fun and we work hard.  Ivalua is a truly global company with a diverse team of contributors and a set of core values that people can feel every day across all our offices.
Opportunity Statement
Reporting to the Senior Digital Marketing Manager, the Global Digital Marketing Intern will support in the creation, implementation, and reporting of digital marketing campaigns. 
 
Key Responsibilities
 
Digital Marketing Campaigns: (40%)

Support teams to plan, develop, and execute marketing initiatives, including but not limited to:

Paid campaign development and execution - paid social, SEM, display
Assist with email campaigns and landing pages
Assist with Search Engine Optimization (SEO)

Coordinate requests for creative assets between the digital marketing and design team
Support the marketing team in daily administrative tasks & ad hoc projects
Consistently review our website and landing pages for quality assurance
Assist leadership and management with the preparation of presentations and reports

 
Digital Marketing Reporting (60%)

Maintaining weekly and monthly reporting processes, including but not limited to:

Digital dashboards - manual and automated - for digital channel performance
Website analytics
Budget tracking and reporting for campaign as spend
Digital pl 

Support leadership/management for report-outs for Global presentations
Further develop skills to analyze campaign level data to provide reports, benchmarks and optimizations against KPIs and summarize


Preferred Education / Experience
 

Currently pursuing a degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or a related field (or recent graduate)
Basic understanding of digital marketing concepts and tools
Comfortable managing various tools, platforms, and processes
Strong written & verbal communication skills in English, French/German/Italian is a plus
Familiarity with: HubSpot, LinkedIn Ads & Google Ads
Strong project management skills
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and Google Workspace 
Passionate, curious about marketing best practices, self-starter
Ability to prioritize and comfortable working in a fast-paced environment
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
Google Analytics and HubSpot certification preferred

Check out our video and find out Who We Are!
Join Ivalua today and procure a great future for your career!

questions.label: This role will require a Hybrid work schedule of 3 days of the week working in the office - Tuesday and Thursday in the office is required with the 3rd day based on Department preference. Are you able to work this Hybrid work schedule?
What is your expected Base Salary (not including bonus) for this position? A narrow range or single number is greatly appreciated.
Do you now, or will you in the future, require sponsorship or a work permit to work legally for our Company?
If YES to requiring sponsorship, what is the basis of the current work authorization AND when does the work authorization expire?
